validations.maxDate_v2: {{field}} must be less than or equal to {{date}}
validations.password_pattern: {{field}} Invalid. Password must valid rule: Greater than 8 characters; At least 1 numberic character, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 specific character: @$!%*?&#_
